select.all: SELECT U.id, U.kid, user_name AS company, server, genics, userkey, name, (SELECT COUNT(kid) FROM accounts WHERE kid = U.kid AND is_admin = 0) AS account_number, ( select max( DATE_FORMAT( update_on, '%Y-%m-%d') ) from accounts where kid = U.kid )AS update_on FROM kids AS U INNER JOIN login_users AS L ON U.author_id = L.id INNER JOIN customers AS cus ON U.kid = cus.kid;
select.servers: SELECT ip, name, type, ENV.environment FROM servers AS SV INNER JOIN environments AS ENV ON SV.environment_id = ENV.id ORDER BY environment, name;
select.accounts: SELECT kid, client_id, DATE_FORMAT( update_on, '%Y-%m-%d') as update_on FROM accounts where kid = ? and is_admin = 0;
select.users: SELECT * FROM login_users where uid = ? and password = ?;

update.date: UPDATE USERS SET updateDate = ? WHERE kid = ?
update.accout_number: UPDATE USERS SET account_number = ? WHERE kid = ?

insert.kids: INSERT INTO kids ( kid, server, genics, userkey, company, author_id, update_on ) VALUES ( ?,?,?,?,?,?,NOW() );
